query:
SELECT ' ' AS Bild, name AS Name, name AS ID, 
   gender AS Geschlecht, 
   health AS Gesundheit, stamina AS Energie, hitdamage AS Trefferschaden, 
   attackrange AS Angriffsreichweite, attackreaction AS Angriffsreaktion, 
   walkspeed AS Gehgeschwindigkeit, runspeed AS Laufgeschwindigkeit, herdmax AS Herde_max, 
   assetpath,  '#Version#' || npcs.name AS "Ab Version"  
   FROM npcs  WHERE  type='Animal'  
    order by name
